'''Jeroney''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] who appeared in [[Secret Summer Paradise]].

==Location==
After completing the {{Quest|Zip Along (According to Safe Cart Operating Procedures)}}, he can be found at the western stop of Violet track.
<gallery>
Event Quest A Starry Night, as Remembered Start Location.png|Jeroney's location
Event Quest A Starry Night, as Remembered Start Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Profile==
Like other characters in the Mirage (besides Idyia), the blue-haired Jeroney is a [[Hydro Eidolon]] replica of a human from Teyvat that once visited Mirage and then left it.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Back to Normal: The Story Hidden in the Bottle}}</ref>

===Appearance===
Like his brothers, Jeroney has short watery-blue hair, glowing blue eyes, and wears an [[Adventurers' Guild]] uniform. He also wears a black glasses.
